dialogue.name: Noah
dialogue.text: So, how are your classes going today?

dialogue.name: Mike
dialogue.text: I still don't understand the difference between math and algebra…

dialogue.name: Mike
dialogue.text: And why do we need geometry... They made it separate from algebra.

dialogue.name: Mike
dialogue.text: Why couldn't they just leave it all as math…

dialogue.name: Noah
dialogue.text: I agree, I wonder why people think you're stupid?

dialogue.name: Mike
dialogue.text: Really? I haven't noticed, hahahaha.

dialogue.name: Mike
dialogue.text: Is it just me, or are you whistling while you talk?
Spreading my fingers across my mouth, I pointed to the soldier who was missing from the row.

dialogue.name: Mike
dialogue.text: Did you lose your teeth, baby?

dialogue.name: Noah
dialogue.text: Mike, it's called a baby tooth…

dialogue.name: Mike
dialogue.text: The main thing is that you understand.
Suddenly, we heard the sound of slaps.
Turning around, we saw two high school students fighting.
The first one tried to kick the second one, but slipped and fell face down.
The second one tried to hit him on the back of the head, but his fist hit the floor.
And that was the end of the mortal combat...
After the fight, they got up and helped each other to the classroom.
As soon as they got up, I noticed that the fallen boy's tooth was lying on the floor.
Seizing the opportunity, I quickly ran over and put it in my pocket.

dialogue.name: Mike
dialogue.text: Why do people call me weird when you put other people's teeth in your pockets, ahahaha.

dialogue.name: Noah
dialogue.text: It's for the Tooth Fairy!

dialogue.name: Mike
dialogue.text: What do you mean? You're helping the fairy?
Damn, I let it slip, what should I do?
